sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RE-AGGRAVATION, in tbe Romiſh eccleſiaſti-pal law, the laſt monitory, publiſhed after three admo-nitions, and be⅞re the laſt excommunication. Before they proceed to fulminate the laſt excommunication, they pfibliſh an aggravation, and a re-aggravation. Fevret obferves, that in France the miniſter is not allowed to pome to re-aggravation, without the permiſſion of the biſhop or official, as well as that of the lay judgei See J⅛POM MUNI CATION.
